review_blob: Not a half bad adaptation of a fruit beer. Nice smooth lager, but not over the top. Solid blueberry taste, but not overpowering. light smooth finish.
Absolutely love this beer. One of the best ipas available anywhere. Nice full bodied flavor and hopped to an out of this world level. If you like super hoppy beers this ones for you!
Love this pale ale. Nice malty flavor combined with a flowery hoppy aroma and palate. Excellent brew.

beer_name: Triple C Baby Maker Double IPA

review_blob: Absolutely one of the best beers I've ever had. Such a complex taste and sophistication to the flavor profile I'm not sure where to begin. Just find it and try it. You won't be disappointed.
Bery smooth ipa. Excellent hoppy aroma but not overly powerful hoppy flavor on the palate.
